text:
e="preserve">Allen Stephen Covert (born October 13, 1964) is an American comedian, actor, writer, and producer. He is best known for his starring role in the classic 2006 comedy movie "Grandma's Boy". He was born in West Palm Beach, Florida.
He was in many movies with actor and friend Adam Sandler such as "Happy Gilmore" (1996), "The Wedding Singer" (1998), "Big Daddy" (1999), "Little Nicky" (2000), "Mr. Deeds" (2002), "Anger Management" (2003), "50 First Dates" (2004) and "I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry" (2007).

annotations.surface_form: I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry
